title: Our Work
text: We're on a mission to make the web beautiful. Through our passion for web design & development, we're meeting our goal one client at a time.

work_items.name: Packrs
work_items.description: With the largest on-demand network in the industry, you can explore your city, find its hidden hotspots, and watch as we bring your new favorites right to your door. Able to deliver anything from anywhere, Packrs is the food delivery, grocery delivery, whatever-you-can-think-of delivery app to bring what you crave right to your door.

work_items.name: Jslsingh
work_items.description: JSL aka Jaspal Singh, is an Indian music director and singer from New Delhi, India. His track “Paranda” was Mega Hit, which made him famous. He started his Musical Journey with underground remix mixtapes in the early 2000s but due to lack of family support he left music and started assisting his dad in their family business, after a 2-year gap he decided to pursue his dreams to be a Music Director.

work_items.name: listme-app
work_items.description: ListMe is an event social networking service for brands to build & engage with their followers, a seamless virtual door with a cashless feature to accommodate the change in user behaviour.

work_items.name: Zeiq
work_items.description: Hi! We're ZEIQ. A full service digital agency which helps your brand stand out. Checkout our work The web development process includes web design, web content development, client-side/server-side scripting and network security configuration, among other tasks.

work_items.name: DEXLAB
work_items.description: Dexlab is a france based company which provides online wallet for cryptocurrency. They deal in Ethereum. It has a very transparent and safe mode of saving your valuable currency.

work_items.name: FoodBucket
work_items.description: FoodBucket Waiter app allows waiter to take orders by simply selecting food categories and items with zero complexity.Customer can view the menu and place table top orders and the staff can deliver order to the table and collect payment once done. This mode is for bars and restaurants who like to adapt a work flow model with minimum staff and faster service.Get access to advance set of reports which cover sales, purchases, inventory, profit and loss statements. etc, which can be generated on daily. weekly. monthly. quarterly, semi-annually and annually basis.

work_items.name: Zeiq Academy
work_items.description: Seeking to learn web development? With our top of the line execution & as an innovative team we take a broad way to deal with handling the important issues of development and design in this digitally aware world. We will teach latest technologies and tools to ensure perfect satisfaction.

work_items.name: ClipBucket
work_items.description: Seeking to learn web development? With our top of the line execution & as an innovative team we take a broad way to deal with handling the important issues of development and design in this digitally aware world. We will teach latest technologies and tools to ensure perfect satisfaction.
